name: CrowdKills#1
description:
Specially for UNC 2022 Game Jam!

The game was developed in 5 days, there are small bugs, but I hope you won't notice them :)

Later I want to finalize the project and post a full version.

Leave a review if you liked the game, or if there are suggestions for improvement.

Thanks for your attention!

P.S. scale on the top left indicates overheating of the weapon and when it fills up, you will need to wait until it completely subsides (I'm not a very good game designer :) )

CONTROLS:

Press any button to start the game.

w / up - forward shooting;

s / down - backward shooting;

a/ left - left movement;

d / right - right movement;
